allow:
Bash(algorithmIdentifier MUST be absent, not NULL."

Error: "Failed to read asymmetric key" - OpenSSL couldn''t parse the DER
because ED25519 public keys should NOT have parameters at all.

WRONG DER Structure (what we had):
SEQUENCE (length 44)
  AlgorithmIdentifier SEQUENCE (length 9)
    OBJECT IDENTIFIER 1.3.101.112
    NULL                          ‚Üê WRONG! Should be absent
  BIT STRING (33 bytes)
    [32-byte public key]

CORRECT DER Structure (RFC 8410):
SEQUENCE (length 40)
  AlgorithmIdentifier SEQUENCE (length 5)
    OBJECT IDENTIFIER 1.3.101.112  ‚Üê OID only, no parameters
  BIT STRING (33 bytes)
    [32-byte public key]

Changes in DER hex:
Before: 3028 3009 06 03 2b65 70 0500 0321 00 [key]
After:  3028 3005 06 03 2b65 70 0321 00 [key]

The AlgorithmIdentifier now has:
- No NULL parameter (removed 0500)
- Correct length 5 (just the OID, no parameters)

This creates a proper RFC 8410 compliant SPKI ED25519 public key that
OpenSSL will accept.

EOF
)")
